message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $9,500. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I believe I can only pay $9,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, thanks for the counteroffer. I appreciate your interest.  I'm willing to come down to $9,250. That's a fair price considering the value of the product. Let me know if you're interested.
Hello Alice, I've reviewed your latest offer and am willing to consider it. I would like to propose a price of $9,100 for the product. I hope this meets within your expectations.
